strings: <se_def>*: ...So that's why you're here! You're chasing after him too! Well, I suppose it's my turn to tell you our story now...

<se_def>*: Dhoulmagus murdered our boss, Mr. Golding.
We're chasing after him so that we can avenge his death.

<se_def>*: He went into the ruins here,
so we followed him inside, but...

<se_def>*: It's pitch black in there and we couldn't see a thing. We had no choice but to withdraw.
It looks like we've come as far as we can.
<se_def>*: The darkness doesn't seem to hinder that devil at all.
<se_def>*: I'm sure he's still inside, but we can't get any closer to him while that dark aura remains.
<se_def>*: We were racking our brains trying to think of a way to pass through it and we remembered the royal mirror of Argonia...

<se_def>*: Apparently the Argonian royal family has
a magical mirror that can dispel darkness.
Maybe that would do the trick.
<se_def>*: I doubt very much that they'd lend it to us, though. Unless they were in our debt somehow...
